service
*******


Description
===========

An object that represents one or multiple Oracle services that you can
enable for a ServiceGateway. In the User Guide topic Access to Oracle
Services: Service Gateway, the term *service CIDR label* is used to
refer to the string that represents the regional public IP address
ranges of the Oracle service or services covered by a given *Service*
object. That unique string is the value of the *Service* object's
*cidrBlock* attribute.


Available Commands
==================

* get

* list
